general.title: General
general.appearance.title: Appearance
general.appearance.displayLanguage.title: Display Language
general.appearance.displayLanguage.desc: Not all messages are translated; revert to "English" when reporting issues.
general.appearance.showStatusInEditor.de: Display sync status in editor. Requires restart.
general.appearance.showStatusAsIcons.des: Display sync status in editor as icons instead of text. Requires restart.
general.appearance.showStatusInStatusBar: Display sync status in the status bar. Requires restart.
Use Status Icon Instead on Banner
Display an icon instead of a warning banner. This will not provide details.
general.logging.title: Logging
general.logging.onlyNotifications.title: Notifications Only
general.logging.onlyNotifications.desc: Disables logging; only shows notifications. Turn off if reporting issues.
general.logging.verboseLogging.title: Verbose Logging
general.logging.verboseLogging.desc: Provides more detailed logs. Turn on if reporting issues.
general.reset.title: Reset
general.reset.resetClient.title: Reset Client
general.reset.resetClient.desc: Clears the client's configuration and disconnects it from the server, returning it to its initial state. The server configuration and data is not affected.
